Legal designation of composition / ingredients (allergens written in CAPITAL LETTERS)
Cereals containing GLUTEN (wheat, rye, barley, oats ...); CRUSTACEANS and shellfish products; EGGS and egg products; FISH and fish products fish-based; Peanuts and peanut-based products; SOYA and soy-based products; MILK and milk-based products (including lactose); NUTS (almonds, hazelnuts, walnuts, cashews, walnuts pecan, pistachios…); CELERY and celery products; MUSTARD and mustard products; SESAME SEEDS and products based on sesame seeds; SULFUR ANHYBRID and sulphites (in certain quantities); LUPINE and products based lupine; MOLLUSCS and products made from molluscs.
